trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño en un diseñador visual para el control de servidor web <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control representa un origen de datos que llama a métodos de un objeto comercial con el fin de realizar las operaciones de base de datos de Delete, Insert, Select y Update.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: En un diseñador visual, al cambiar de origen a la vista de diseño, el código fuente de marcado que describe el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control se analiza y se crea una versión en tiempo de diseño del control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Al cambiar a vista de origen, el control de tiempo de diseño se conserva en el código fuente de marcado y editar en el marcado de la página Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> clase proporciona compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control en un diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class members provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> los miembros de clase proporcionan la funcionalidad siguiente:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property indicates whether the Configure Data Source wizard can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> propiedad indica si se puede mostrar el Asistente para configurar orígenes de datos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property indicates whether the schema of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can be refreshed at design time.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propiedad indica si el esquema del asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control puede actualizarse en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property specifies the method that performs the Select function.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propiedad especifica el método que realiza la función Select.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property specifies the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> propiedad especifica el tipo del objeto comercial que proporciona los datos para el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> método devuelve una vista del origen de datos con el nombre especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a list of data source view names for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> método devuelve una lista de nombres de vista de origen de datos para la asociada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method extracts the metadata for the Select method from the associated business object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método extrae los metadatos para el método de selección del objeto de negocio asociadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method causes the Configure Data Source wizard to be displayed on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método hace que el asistente Configurar origen de datos que se mostrará en la superficie del diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method removes properties from, adds additional properties to, or shadows properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método quita las propiedades de, agrega propiedades adicionales para o shadows propiedades del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo extender el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> clase para cambiar la apariencia y el comportamiento de los controles que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyObjectDataSource` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se deriva el `MyObjectDataSource` controlar desde la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.

trans-unit.source: The `MyObjectDataSource` is a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: El `MyObjectDataSource` es una copia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> and applies a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> attribute for the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` on the `MyObjectDataSource` control.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo también se deriva la `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` clase desde el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> y se aplica un <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> atributo para la `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` en el `MyObjectDataSource` control.

trans-unit.source: The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time.
trans-unit.target: El `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` invalida la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método para realizar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> propiedad visible en el **propiedades** cuadrícula en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> properties in a placeholder, in addition to the control type and ID.
trans-unit.target: El `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` invalida la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para mostrar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propiedades en un marcador de posición, además del tipo de control y el Id.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework crea internamente una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> clase cuando se crea el asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control o una copia de ese control en la superficie del diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si se puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" />; es <see langword="false" /> en caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método puede llamarse y el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> propiedad es `true`, si la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> propiedad del asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implementa o la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> es `true`, **Configurar origen de datos** elemento de menú se muestra en el **tareas comunes de ObjectDataSource** menú contextual del control asociado en la superficie del diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: The Configure Data Source wizard is invoked when this menu item is selected.
trans-unit.target: El Asistente para configurar orígenes de datos se invoca cuando se selecciona este elemento de menú.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si se puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties both contain a value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método puede llamarse y el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propiedad es `true`, si la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> propiedad del asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implementa el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interfaz y el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> ambas propiedades contienen un valor.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> es `true`, **actualizar esquema** elemento de menú se muestra en el **tareas comunes de ObjectDataSource** menú contextual del control asociado en la superficie del diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Muestra el Asistente para configurar origen de datos en la superficie del diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method initiates a transaction that causes the Configure Data Source wizard to appear on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método inicia una transacción que hace que aparezca el asistente Configurar origen de datos en la superficie del diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is called when you select the **Configure Data Source** menu item on the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método se llama cuando se selecciona el **Configurar origen de datos** elemento de menú en el **tareas comunes de ObjectDataSource** menú contextual del asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the context menu when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: El **Configurar origen de datos** elemento de menú aparece en el menú contextual cuando el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> propiedad es `true`.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el nombre de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una vista de origen de datos con el nombre especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> with the name specified by <paramref name="viewName" />.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> con el nombre especificado por <paramref name="viewName" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> método devuelve un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> objeto con el nombre especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `viewName` is `null` or an empty string (""), the first view name in the array of names that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> is used as the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Si `viewName` es `null` o una cadena vacía (""), el primer nombre de vista de la matriz de nombres que se devuelve por <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> se utiliza como el nombre especificado.

trans-unit.source: If no view names are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> generates an unnamed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: Si no hay nombres de vista no devuelve el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> genera una sin nombre <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una lista con nombres de vista de origen de datos para el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> objects of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Una matriz de cadenas que contiene los nombres de los objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method gets the view names from the names of the schema data tables of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> método obtiene los nombres de vista de los nombres del esquema de tablas de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Colección que implementa el objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> de las propiedades agregadas y reemplazadas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: La usa el diseñador para quitar o agregar propiedades en la presentación de la cuadrícula **Propiedades**, o para reemplazar propiedades del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Diseñadores de controles utilizan métodos que se derivan de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombrear las diversas propiedades de control con propiedades en tiempo de diseño correspondientes que el diseñador implementa, y para quitar propiedades o agregar propiedades a la **propiedades** cuadrícula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control so that they appear in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método crea propiedades en tiempo de diseño a sombra la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> propiedades del asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controlar la manera en que aparecen en la **propiedades** cuadrícula del diseñador visual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método en una clase que se hereda de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> clase para cambiar la **propiedades** cuadrícula de un control que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> clase de diseño hora.

trans-unit.source: The example makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se realiza el <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> propiedad visible en el **propiedades** cuadrícula.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para agregar propiedades o cambiar atributos de propiedades en la colección de propiedades de tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: No olvide llamar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> base método antes de realizar otro procesamiento.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor es <see langword="true" />, no se muestran mensajes de error cuando se producen excepciones al procesar; de lo contrario, se muestran mensajes de excepción.

trans-unit.source: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Extrae los metadatos para el método Select del objeto comercial especificado por el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method extracts the metadata for the method that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property from the <xref:System.Type> object that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property, which is the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método extrae los metadatos para el método llamado por el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propiedad desde el <xref:System.Type> objeto denominada por el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> propiedad, que es el tipo del objeto comercial que proporciona los datos para el asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.

trans-unit.source: The metadata is saved in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> array and in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> array of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Los metadatos se guardan en un <xref:System.Data.DataTable> matriz y en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> matriz del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> method of the associated control is called.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre del método que se va a ejecutar cuando se llama al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the method to execute when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene el nombre del método que se va a ejecutar cuando se llama a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> sombras de propiedad del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> propiedad del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propiedad ha cambiado, el marcado en tiempo de diseño para la asociada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control se actualiza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método se llama, si la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propiedad es true; en caso contrario, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> evento se desencadena.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre del tipo que contiene los métodos especificados en el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the type that contains the methods that perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations specified in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene el nombre del tipo que contiene los métodos que realizan las operaciones de eliminación, inserción, selección y actualización de bases de datos especificadas en el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> sombras de propiedad del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> propiedad del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> propiedad ha cambiado, el marcado en tiempo de diseño para la asociada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control se actualiza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método se llama, si la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propiedad es true; en caso contrario, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> evento se desencadena.
